data.text:
@SenThomTillis If Powell is allowed to plan his retirement by overpaying contractors and Thom tells DOJ they can’t investigate do we assume Thom is getting kick backs too?
Why is this Senator trying to protect Powell from a Common Sense Investigation?
@SenThomTillis You have NO right to interfere with the new Fed Chair being voted in. You are such a piece a shit, I cannot wait for you to leave office. Everyone in NC hates you.
@SenThomTillis Get out of the way of what Americans voted for. A change at the Fed is just another example of you and your corrupt never Trump friends impeding the American voters.
@SenThomTillis Tell that to the last administration. We wouldn’t be in this position if they did things legally.
@SenThomTillis One thing that both sides of the aisle can agree on is that you suck!

@SenThomTillis I am stunned by your call to remove Kristi Noem. She is a Hero! She is doing her best to remove the millions of invaders that Biden and Mayorkas allowed to flood into this country. You should be kissing her feet. And you have the gall to call yourself conservative? You’re a fraud

@SenThomTillis While Tillis issued statements, no records show him introducing legislation or taking formal Senate actions against the Trump indictments, contrasting his current threats to block Trump administration nominees over a DOJ probe into Fed Chair Powell.
